conversation.content: Um, hi, I'm—sorry, I know this is probably, uh, stupid but I got this complaint?
So, um, let me just, uh, pull up your account here and—hmm, okay so basically I need your driver ID, like, the one that starts with DRV?
It's, um, DRV-4429-BK. Sorry. I'm just. Really upset.
Got it, so, uh, I'm seeing account DRV-4429-BK here and, um, looks like there's a complaint filed yesterday, reference number CMP-88291-QX, so basically what, uh, what happened exactly?
This passenger said I was—wait no, they said—sorry. Said I was rude?
Mm-hmm, so the complaint CMP-88291-QX says, um, "unprofessional behavior" and, uh, I mean, these things happen but like, tell me your side?
I maybe asked them to, uh, not eat in my car? That's—that's it.
So, uh, lemme just, hmm, check the trip details here, trip ID TRP-55847-NZ shows it was, um, like a twenty-minute ride and, uh, no other flags so...
Twenty minutes of them, um, eating messy food! Sorry. I shouldn't—I'm being dramatic.
No no, so basically, um, look, I've seen like hundreds of these and, uh, food complaints are super common, so let me just, um, add your statement to case CMP-88291-QX here.
But my rating dropped. I need—I can't afford to lose this job. Please.

Right so, uh, here's what I can do, and like, I'm gonna be straight with you—ratings from complaint CMP-88291-QX, those are, um, basically locked for 24 hours but, uh, after review they sometimes get reversed.
Sometimes? That's—I mean, probably not gonna help me then.
So actually, um, with your driver history—and I'm seeing like, really solid stats here in account DRV-4429-BK—so basically you've got, uh, a strong case for appeal.
Sorry, I just—um, I'm overreacting. My kid's, uh, medical bills and I just...
Listen, so, um, between you and me? File appeal APL-77562-RT, and uh, specifically mention the, um, the food policy violation by passenger, that basically fast-tracks it.
Really? That would—wait, APL what? Sorry.
APL-77562-RT, so like, I'm gonna, uh, pre-fill some of it for you right now and, um, honestly? Should be resolved in, hmm, maybe six hours tops?
I'm sorry for, um, being so—you know. Desperate. Embarrassed.
Hey no, so like, totally get it, um, bills are bills, and uh, look—check your app tomorrow morning, case CMP-88291-QX should show resolved, and um, your rating should bounce back.
